result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
result.translation: 69. Yeemene maray Ni-sabbatah Yallih naqboytiitiiy, nafsiiy, sheetanal yingicillee, diggah Ni-gitittel tirri ken heenno, kaadu diggah Yalli meqe mará luk yan catóo kee dacayrih.
